# portkey_integration_models (Data Source)

Fetches model access configuration for a Portkey integration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Query models for an integration
data "portkey_integration_models" "openai" {
  integration_id = "openai-production"  # Integration slug or ID
}

# Check if all models are allowed
output "allow_all_models" {
  value = data.portkey_integration_models.openai.allow_all_models
}

# List all available models
output "available_models" {
  value = data.portkey_integration_models.openai.models
}

# Filter to only enabled models
output "enabled_models" {
  value = [for m in data.portkey_integration_models.openai.models : m.slug if m.enabled]
}

# Filter to only custom models
output "custom_models" {
  value = [for m in data.portkey_integration_models.openai.models : m.slug if m.is_custom]
}
```

### Use with for_each

```terraform
data "portkey_integration_models" "openai" {
  integration_id = portkey_integration.openai.slug
}

# Enable specific models from the available list
resource "portkey_integration_model_access" "selected" {
  for_each = toset(["gpt-4", "gpt-4-turbo"])

  integration_id = portkey_integration.openai.slug
  model_slug     = each.value
  enabled        = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `integration_id` (String) The integration slug or ID to query model access for.

### Read-Only

- `allow_all_models` (Boolean) Whether all models are allowed by default for this integration.
- `id` (String) Data source identifier (same as integration_id).
- `models` (Attributes List) List of model access configurations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--models))

<a id="nestedatt--models"></a>
### Nested Schema for `models`

Read-Only:

- `base_model_slug` (String) Base model slug for fine-tuned models.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the model is enabled for this integration.
- `is_custom` (Boolean) Whether this is a custom model.
- `is_finetune` (Boolean) Whether this is a fine-tuned model.
- `pricing_config` (Object) Pricing configuration for this model. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--models--pricing_config))
- `slug` (String) Model identifier (slug).

<a id="nestedatt--models--pricing_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `models.pricing_config`

Read-Only:

- `pay_as_you_go` (Object) Pay-as-you-go pricing configuration.
  - `request_token_price` (Number) Price per request token.
  - `response_token_price` (Number) Price per response token.
- `type` (String) Pricing type.
